document_data.mainbody:
aeglyn was a carpenter that lived on the Sword Coast as of the late 15 century DR.
He had two children, including a son named Galan.
Taeglyns shoe had the image of a heart placed upon it by his son Galan. It was a reminder of his son that Taeglyn could look to when away from his family.
In the , Taeglyn was traveling to Baldurs Gate when he was captured by goblin raiders loyal to the Cult of the Absolute and taken to the Shattered Sanctum. He died that same year while trying to tunnel out of his cell, not willing to allow himself to be fed to the goblins worgs.
